mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room(room_id, product_id, buyer, seller) VALUES(#{roomId}, #{prdtId}, #{buyer}, #{seller})
INSERT INTO chat_message(room_id, sender, content, send_date) VALUES(#{roomId}, #{sender}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_trade_status, b.seller, b.room_Id FROM product a INNER JOIN chat_room b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE b.buyer = #{buyer} OR b.seller = #{buyer}
SELECT room_id FROM chat_room WHERE product_id = #{prdtId} AND buyer = #{buyer} AND seller = #{seller}
SELECT case when count(room_id) >= 1 then 'EXISTED' else 'NOT_EXISTED' end as isexisted_room_id FROM chat_room WHERE product_id = #{prdtId} AND buyer = #{buyer} AND seller = #{seller}
